urls.title: Trump’s New Favorite Cable News Network Thinks UNC Created the Coronavirus in a Lab
urls.description: President Trump, facing the biggest public health threat since the 1918 influenza, whined about the media in response to a question from a “journalist” who had, days ago, alleged that a UNC lab had unleashed the coronavirus on the world.
